amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds made available by this Act may be used in contravention of the War Powers Resolution.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds made available by this Act may be used in contravention of the War Powers Resolution.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sherman amendment (A037) Failed by recorded vote: 208 - 213 (Roll no. 394).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
